title: Convert by Body
description: Convert content from request body to markdown format

content.title: Content
content.description: The text content to convert to markdown (use this OR base64Content, not both)

base64Content.title: Base64 Content
base64Content.description: Base64 encoded content (for binary files like PDFs, use this OR content, not both)

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: MIME type of the content (e.g., text/html, application/pdf)

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: Original filename (optional, helps determine file type)

unwantedTags.title: Unwanted tags
unwantedTags.description: Array of HTML tag names to remove during cleaning (only applies to HTML content)

unwantedAttrs.title: Unwanted attributes
unwantedAttrs.description: Array of HTML attribute names to remove during cleaning (supports regex patterns like 'data-.*')

detectArticle.title: Extract article content
detectArticle.description: Whether to extract content from <article> tag if present (only applies to HTML content)
